Ni.name: Introverted Intuition
Ni.description: Sees patterns, meanings, and connections. Focuses on future implications and insights.
characteristics: Focuses on one vision or insight

Ne.name: Extraverted Intuition
Ne.description: Explores possibilities and potential. Sees connections between disparate ideas.

Si.name: Introverted Sensing
Si.description: Compares present experiences with past ones. Values tradition and personal experience.

Se.name: Extraverted Sensing
Se.description: Engages fully with the present moment. Aware of physical environment and sensations.

Ti.name: Introverted Thinking
Ti.description: Creates internal logical frameworks. Seeks precision and accuracy in understanding.

Te.name: Extraverted Thinking
Te.description: Organizes the external world efficiently. Focuses on objective metrics and results.

Fi.name: Introverted Feeling
Fi.description: Maintains strong personal values and authenticity. Seeks inner harmony.

Fe.name: Extraverted Feeling
Fe.description: Creates harmony in groups. Considers others' emotions and social dynamics.
